ygData.subject: Re: Charges of items
ygData.msgSnippet: How/where do you get the glimmer ring recharged? Ken ... From: Jason Shy  To:  Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
How/where do you get the glimmer ring recharged?
Ken

----- Original Message -----
From: Jason Shy <demur@...>
To: <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 10:45 AM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Charges of items


> From: "Jason Shy" <demur@...>
>
> Depends on the item. Examples. . .
> -Wooly spider silk -- (i think) has 2 charges of ensnaring roots. No way
to
> recharge.
> -Squad ring (heal). . rechargeable unlimited times (granted you dont mind
> the walk)
> -Glimmer ring (gate). . can be recharged for a fee
>
> Im sure that there are lots of items that can be recharged that no one
knows
> about yet. . like the observer staff. . .Im sure that somewhere there is a
> way to recharge it. Maybe not. . .more will unfold as people do more
quests
> and such.
>
> Okay now Im rambling. . .hope this helps.
>
> Demur
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Carl Berisford-Murray <Carl@...>
> To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 12:28 AM
> Subject: [EQCheats] Charges of items
>
>
> >From: Carl Berisford-Murray <Carl@...>
> >
> >Hi all
> >
> >Small request, and unfortunately I have no spoiler :(
> >
> >When an item has charges, is it possible to recharge it? And if so, how?
> >
> >Thanks
> >
> >Utelr
> >On Errolisi Marr
